title: Brand Story
story:
Clothes carry the spirit of people.
What we create goes beyond simply being worn; it becomes, for both the wearer and the viewer, a beginning to reveal oneâ€™s identity.
That beginning is the most beautiful way to express oneself, and when these colors come together, they ultimately form a culture shared by individuals and communities alike.
HanGage does not follow fast fashion or capital-driven sameness, but creates garments that reflect the unique colors and stories of each nation and each individual.
